content:
Did you have a great time this weekend busily entering Jira tickets for the Jan ballot but then started to wonder if you remembered to vote on ALL of them?
Are you concerned that some of the 170+ Jira tickets entered between 12/1/2021 and today not associated with a ballot (and thus won't count as a ballot comment) MIGHT BE YOURS?
Do you dread the idea of having to look through all of the tickets you entered to make sure they have all be voted on?

Fear not. There is a filter for you.
With this filter, you can quickly see the tickets you entered since 12/1/2021, that are not associated with a ballot vote.
https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16429
